stories.storyTldr: Following Jim Courier's path - ranked #1 in Florida juniors, committed to Duke tennis
stories.achievement: State tennis champion, 4.0 GPA, Duke University commit
stories.parentQuote: The same coaches who developed Jim Courier are mentoring our son
stories.studentQuote: Knowing Jim Courier walked these same courts motivates me every day

stories.storyTldr: Following Naarai Jacobs' footsteps - lead in every production, accepted to Juilliard pre-college
stories.achievement: Lead in 12 productions, Juilliard pre-college program
stories.parentQuote: The same stage where Naarai Jacobs started is launching our daughter's career
stories.studentQuote: Our drama teacher worked with Naarai - now she's mentoring me

stories.storyTldr: Built apps in the same computer lab where Brandon Silverman started CrowdTangle
stories.achievement: Created school safety app, internship at Microsoft
stories.parentQuote: SSES alumni like Ryan Roslansky (LinkedIn CEO) inspire our son daily
stories.studentQuote: Brandon Silverman started coding here - now he's my mentor

stories.storyTldr: Inspired by alumna Janelle Coutts at NASA - won national science fair, MIT-bound
stories.achievement: Intel Science Fair finalist, researching with USF professors
stories.parentQuote: Knowing SSES sent someone to NASA makes anything seem possible
stories.studentQuote: Janelle Coutts came back to speak - she showed me the path to NASA

stories.storyTldr: Training where Sydney Brown started - now freshman QB breaking records
stories.achievement: Led middle school to championship, high school varsity starter as freshman
stories.parentQuote: Sydney Brown's NFL journey started here - our son sees that path
stories.studentQuote: Coach tells us Sydney Brown stories - it makes us believe

stories.storyTldr: Math team captain inspired by Brittany Skoda's path to Morgan Stanley
stories.achievement: Founded investment club, internship at Raymond James
stories.parentQuote: Brittany Skoda proves SSES girls can run Wall Street
stories.studentQuote: Ms. Skoda video-called our class from Morgan Stanley - I knew that's my future

stories.storyTldr: Shadowing Dr. Lauren Carcas '97 at Miami Cancer Institute this summer
stories.achievement: Founded medical club, accepted to Johns Hopkins pre-med program
stories.parentQuote: Dr. Carcas mentors SSES students - that connection is priceless
stories.studentQuote: Dr. Carcas showed me that SSES students become doctors who change lives

stories.storyTldr: School newspaper editor following Elizabeth Djinis '12 to journalism career
stories.achievement: Published in Tampa Bay Times student section, Columbia Journalism summer program
stories.parentQuote: Elizabeth Djinis writes for Tampa Bay Times - she started here too
stories.studentQuote: Ms. Djinis guest-edited our paper - she showed me journalism matters

stories.storyTldr: Third grader who loves exploring became youngest published nature photographer
stories.achievement: Photography in National Geographic Kids, created school nature trail guide
stories.parentQuote: SSES turns curiosity into real accomplishment, even in elementary school
stories.studentQuote: My teacher said my photos were special - now they're in a magazine!

stories.storyTldr: Student council president inspired by Jason Kaplan '91, now at FBI
stories.achievement: Led school's first Model UN conference, started civic engagement club
stories.parentQuote: Jason Kaplan FBI story shows SSES students become leaders who serve
stories.studentQuote: Agent Kaplan spoke at assembly - he said it all started in student government here
